name: YES! HG
overview: This game contains eight separate games. 1st, three families of ninja went for a treasure hunt. 2nd, DS, a mutant wants revenge. 3rd, a guy and his girlfriend went on a weird trip. 4th, Ever, a guy and his friend battle body/mind controlling monsters. 5th, Dark Trade, guys have the job of/or their life. 6th, bad guy leader vs super heroine. 7th, a fast shooter(bed/gun) is tested. 8th, crime and punishment/reward.
